title: [Large-Scale] Comparative Analysis of Evolutionary Mechanisms in Biological Circuit Design

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental life science knowledge and basic computer science concepts
context.additional_context: Comparative analysis of structural similarities between biological and machine learning circuits using an evolutionary approach in smartphone-based microlearning environments

learning_goals: Explain the basic components of biological circuits and their environmental adaptation mechanisms.
Compare problem-solving approaches between machine learning models and biological circuits to derive differences.
Analyze the impact of random connection networks on biological design through case-based studies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
